name: Onepiece Tube Ruby (Material)
description:
A very simple style. Simply a cleaner and faster version of the outdated onepiece-tube.com website using reddish colours as a foundation.

Current version: 1.2.2
additional_info:
v1.2.2:
- Removed rating instructions above video
- Removed social media links under video
- Centered report video link under video

v1.2.1: 
- Removed the newly added overlapping logo in the header
- Removed advertisement banners
- Removed other amazon links

v1.1:  Fixed minor issue with image loading in video-section.

v1.0:  Main release.
